Edited September 11, 2015 by Teilnehmer

I support this idea!

A section dedicated to the game with the RO package (RSS, RF, RT, RP0, etc.) installed would certainly be useful to me, and anyone like me, who mostly want information specific to the experience of playing KSP the masochistic way.

Supported but, I believe, highly unlikely. If you give RO special status you then have to consider giving special status to other things like, say, USI and KSPI-E and whatever.

E: You can also join us in #RO on Esper.net IRC if you want help.

Why not?

One can create a poll. If a lot of people agree that the forum structure would be more convenient after creating a special section for that particular mod, then why not?

Much as some might like to deny it, you're still playing KSP. The "proper place" is the same as always - General KSP Discussion for general chat,

Gameplay Questions and Tutorials for help, Support (modded installs) for bugs, and so on. You might adopt an unofficial [Realism Overhaul] tag or similar if you like.
